Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Enacts the "economic development performance review act"; directs state agencies to conduct annual comprehensive performance review of economic development activities
Summary: Enacts the economic development performance review act and prescribes the functions and purposes of the special evaluation program bond act; requires state agencies involved in economic development activities to prepare an annual comprehensive performance review of their programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the economic development performance review act
